sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Family Case Management Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Family Case Management Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings and purpose. The General Assembly finds as follows:
sections.text: Legislative findings and purpose. The General Assembly finds as follows:

sections.heading: Family Case Management Program
sections.text: The Department shall establish and administer a family case management program. The purposes of the program shall be to reduce the incidence of infant mortality, very low birthweight infants, and low birthweight infants and to assist low-income families to obtain a

sections.heading: The Infant Mortality Reduction Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Infant Mortality Reduction Act is repealed.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
